title: :warning: **Warning** :warning:
description: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? **This will untrack all of your courses and delete all traces of your profile from our database.** You **will not recieve notifications** for any tracked courses. **This action is irreversible.**

fields.name: *Note*
fields.value: *If you activated Call Notifications, you will lose this functionality even if you recreate your profile. You will need to contact <@516413751155621899> to get this functionality back.*
